rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Birds at a commercial turkey farm in Southern Indiana contracted the virus [avian flu] last week, forcing officials to cull 29,000 turkeys in an attempt to stop the spread.

rationale: 'contracted' is factual. 'forcing...to cull' is factual consequence. 'cull' is containment (Containment override).
statement_text: Birds at a commercial turkey farm in Southern Indiana contracted the virus [avian flu] last week, forcing officials to cull 29,000 turkeys in an attempt to stop the spread.

rationale: The verb 'contracted' is not moderate. 'forcing... to cull' leads to a containment action ('cull') with scale ('29,000'), triggering the override.
statement_text: Birds at a commercial turkey farm in Southern Indiana contracted the virus [avian flu] last week, forcing officials to cull 29,000 turkeys in an attempt to stop the spread.
